reviews.review_msg: Really nice teacher!! I dont know how some people do so bad in this class when she clearly explains ALL the readings during lecture! She's actually got quite a sense of humour as well so the class was never boring! It was my first HUM course and surprisingly did quite well, highly recommended!!

This professor should NOT be teaching. She only appreciates work that is unoriginal and regurgitative, and rejects anything outside of 'approved' methods of thinking (even though this was a course on the avant-garde).  The people in the class were incredibly interesting/intelligent, but from the sound of it there was about a C-ish average. AVOID!

ELEVEN textbooks for a 5 week course!  WAY too much for a 300 level course   Do not take this retarded and unreasonable prof, unless you have nothing better to do than read ELEVEN textbooks (2+ to be read b4 beginning of class)

AVOID!  Worst Prof so far at sfu.  Does not understand how to present material, what is expected at the undergrad level or how to evaluate work, and you will pay for it.  Only interested in 'the right'  (cliche) opinions.   If you are interested in seeing your GPA drop a few points, give her course a try.  If not, stay away.
